## Plot
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r,message=FALSE,echo = FALSE}
library(plotly)
data = tibble::rownames_to_column(mtcars,"car")
plot_ly(data, y= ~reorder(car,mpg), x= ~mpg, type = "bar")
```

above you can find a simple plot that was generated using plotly.
